question: Which company launched its Big investment with Softbank Vision?
explanation: Softbank fund invests one of its largest shareholders Flipkart Group (Flipkart) India's leading e-commerce marketplace announced an investment a mix of primary and secondary capital from SoftBank Vision Fund (Vision Fund), the world's largest technology focused investment fund. This is the biggest ever private investment in an Indian technology company and will make the Vision Fund one of the largest shareholders in Flipkart.
